Sentencas: Warpage evolution during co-firing of multilayer ceramics was systematically recorded and analyzed.
Titulo: Warpage evolution of screen printed multilayer ceramics during co-firing

Sentencas: LaSrMnO3 was screen printed on one side of a green sheet of yttria stabilized zirconia and/or NiO-YSZ was screen printed on the other side.
Titulo: Warpage evolution of screen printed multilayer ceramics during co-firing

Sentencas: During co-firing warpage due to the mismatch in sintering shrinkage was observed.
Titulo: Warpage evolution of screen printed multilayer ceramics during co-firing

Sentencas: The radius of curvature continuously changed as temperature increased.
Titulo: Warpage evolution of screen printed multilayer ceramics during co-firing

Sentencas: The curl was strongly influenced not only by the mismatch in sintering strain but also by the changing viscosity of the components.
Titulo: Warpage evolution of screen printed multilayer ceramics during co-firing

Sentencas: The mechanical stress in the bilayer was calculated from the sintering strain and viscosity data obtained from thermomechanical analysis using cyclic loading dilatometry.
Titulo: Warpage evolution of screen printed multilayer ceramics during co-firing

Sentencas: A strategy for reducing warpage in such systems is presented.
Titulo: Warpage evolution of screen printed multilayer ceramics during co-firing
